summary: Personal calculator app with basic arithmetic operations (addition, subtraction, multiplication, division)
architectural_notes: Built with React and Tailwind CSS

existing_features.title: Create a calculator interface with number buttons (0-9), decimal point, and clear button
Implement basic arithmetic operation buttons for addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division
Add a display screen that shows the current number input and calculation results
Implement calculator logic to handle sequential operations and maintain calculation state
Design a cohesive visual theme with a modern, clean aesthetic using warm earth tones (terracotta, sand, olive) with clear typography and intuitive button layouts that emphasize usability

new_feature_requests.summary: Basic arithmetic operations (addition, subtraction, multiplication, division)
